# Set Chunk Options

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.path='Figs/')
```

# Introduction

Process_GrowthSymmetryData.Rmd processes Growth Symmetry (GS) catalog from a google sheet. This .Rmd generates BalticPhotoperiod_Processed_GrowthSymmetryData.Rds (stored in Data/ProcessedData/ProcessedGrowthSymmetryData folder) and 4 plots (stored in Output/Figures folder).

# Load Libraries and set Project Variables

```{r load libraries, warning = FALSE, echo=FALSE} 
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)
library(broom)
library(knitr)
library(OneR)
library(zoo)
library(strucchange)
library(magrittr)
library(googledrive)
library(googlesheets4)
library(readxl)
library(stringi)
```

```{r set project variables}
Project <- "BalticPhotoperiod"
DataOut <- file.path("..", "Data", "ProcessedData", "ProcessedGrowthSymmetryData")

FigPath <- file.path("..", "Output", "Figures")
FigRdsPath <- file.path("..", "Output", "FiguresRds")
TableRdsPath <- file.path("..", "Output", "TablesRDS")

FileID <- "Smooth"
FileEncode <- "UTF-8" 
Delimiter <- ""
HeaderRows <- 0
```

# Read MetaData

```{r read locally stored metadata from rds}
CultureCatalog <- readRDS(file = file.path("..", "Data", "ImportedData", "ImportedMetaData", "CultureCatalog.Rds"))

CultureCatalog<-CultureCatalog %>% 
  select(-c(PrimaryOperator, Temp_c, ExpCul, ExpStartTime, O2_Category, Optode, OptodeCh, OptodeMeasure))
```

# Read Growth Symmetry (GS) catalog

```{r load local GS catalog, results = "hide", message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo=FALSE}
gs4_deauth()
# this is the URL or ID of a Sheet readable by anyone (with a link)
GScatalog<- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1zqH6iYlqMPigyloLKJPeVWugmcnmgJ-eMU3gLkR6FSU/edit#gid=0")

as.data.frame(GScatalog)
GScatalog <- GScatalog 
```

# Preparing df for further analysis

```{r prepare data - mutate as numeric, calculate AccLen, DecLen, GS (growth symmetry)}
GScatalog <- GScatalog %>% 
  mutate(Acc_perc = as.numeric(Acc_perc)) %>% 
  mutate(Dec_perc = as.numeric(Dec_perc)) %>% 
  mutate(AccDecRatio_perc = Acc_perc/Dec_perc) %>% 
  mutate(Par_ue = as.numeric(Par_ue)) %>% 
  mutate(Photoperiod = as.numeric(Photoperiod)) %>%
  mutate(tMaxAG = as.numeric(tMaxAG)) %>%
  mutate(tMaxDG = as.numeric(tMaxDG)) %>%
  mutate(PhotoperiodTstart_h=as.numeric(PhotoperiodTstart_h)) %>% 
  mutate(PhotoperiodTend_h=as.numeric(PhotoperiodTend_h)) %>% 
  mutate(AccLen = tMaxDG-PhotoperiodTstart_h) %>% 
  mutate(DecLen = PhotoperiodTend_h-tMaxDG) %>% 
  mutate(GS = AccLen/DecLen) %>% 
  mutate(TDG = as.numeric(TDG)) 
```

# Merge GS catalog with MetaData

```{r merge GS catalog with MetaData, warning = FALSE, echo=FALSE}
GScatalogMeta <- CultureCatalog %>%
  left_join(., GScatalog, by = c("Strain" = "Strain", "Photoperiod"="Photoperiod", "Par_ue"="Par_ue","WL"="WL", "O2"="O2")) 
```

# Filtering unrelated values and outliers

```{r cleaning unrelated values and outliers}
GScatalogMeta<-GScatalogMeta %>% 
  filter(Photoperiod!=24) %>% 
  filter(AccDecRatio_perc<10)
  
GScatalogMeta1 <-GScatalogMeta %>% 
  filter(PARPhotonDose_day>=19440000) %>% 
  filter(GS<=2)
GScatalogMeta2 <-GScatalogMeta %>% 
  filter(PARPhotonDose_day<19440000) %>% 
filter(GS<4)

GScatalogMeta<-rbind(GScatalogMeta1,GScatalogMeta2)
rm(GScatalogMeta1,GScatalogMeta2)
```

# Calculate mean of GS from every day (every peak in exp and pre-stationary phase)

```{r calculate mean of GS, warning = FALSE}
GScatalogMeta<-GScatalogMeta %>% 
  group_by(Strain, Photoperiod, Par_ue, Phase) %>%
  summarize(Run, SampleID, Strain, ExpDate, Par_ue, Photoperiod, PARPhotonDose_day, MC, Tube, O2, LightShape, ExpEndDate, PhotoperiodTstart_h, PhotoperiodTend_h,tMaxDG,tMaxAG, Phase, AchivePreStationary, MaxDG, MaxAG, Acc_perc, Dec_perc, Strain, Par_ue, Photoperiod, O2, WL, OD680start, OD680end, TDG, AccDecRatio_perc, AccLen, DecLen, GS, 
            meanAccLen = mean(AccLen), 
            sdAccLen = sd(AccLen),
            meanDecLen = mean(DecLen), 
            sdDecLen = sd(DecLen),
            meanGS = mean(GS), 
            sdGS = sd(GS)) %>%  
  ungroup() 
```
# Rename strain names, create facets labels, and create horizontal lines for plot

```{r rename strain names for plot}
GScatalogMeta<-GScatalogMeta %>% 
    mutate(Strain=case_when(Strain=="BA127R"~"PE-rich_127",
         Strain=="BA48R"~"PE-rich_048",
        Strain=="BA56G"~"PC-rich_056",
         Strain=="BA77G"~"PC-rich_077"))
```

```{r create facets labels for plot}
GScatalogMeta$facetsPar_ue = factor(GScatalogMeta$O2, labels = c("PAR~(Âµmol~photons~m^{-2}~s^{-1})"))
GScatalogMeta$facetsPhotoperiod = factor(GScatalogMeta$WL, labels = c("Photoperiod~(h)"))
GScatalogMeta$facetsStrain = factor(GScatalogMeta$O2, labels = c("Strain"))
GScatalogMeta$facetsPhase = factor(GScatalogMeta$WL, labels = c("Phase~of~growth"))
```

```{r create df to show hline}
data_hlineGS8 <- data.frame(Photoperiod= c(8),facets2= c("Photoperiod~(h)"),value = c(4))
data_hlineGS12 <- data.frame(Photoperiod= c(12),facets2= c("Photoperiod~(h)"),value = c(6))
data_hlineGS16 <- data.frame(Photoperiod= c(16),facets2= c("Photoperiod~(h)"),value = c(8))
```

# Filter 3 data points from stationary phase

```{r}
GScatalogMeta_1<-GScatalogMeta %>%
  filter(Phase == "Pre-stationary") %>%
  filter(Strain != "PE-rich_127")
GScatalogMeta_2<-GScatalogMeta %>%
  filter(Phase == "Pre-stationary") %>%
  filter(Strain == "PE-rich_127") %>%
  filter(Par_ue ==300) %>%
  filter(GS < 0.65)
GScatalogMeta_3<-GScatalogMeta %>%
  filter(Phase == "Pre-stationary") %>%
  filter(Strain == "PE-rich_127") %>%
  filter(Par_ue ==90| Par_ue ==180 | Par_ue ==900)
GScatalogMeta_4<-GScatalogMeta %>%
  filter(Phase == "Exponential")
GScatalogMetaFit<-rbind(GScatalogMeta_1, GScatalogMeta_2, GScatalogMeta_3, GScatalogMeta_4)
  rm(GScatalogMeta_1, GScatalogMeta_2, GScatalogMeta_3, GScatalogMeta_4)
```

# Fit the data to exponential decays

```{r fitting exponential decays, warning = FALSE}
GScatalogMetaExpSt <-GScatalogMetaFit %>% 
  drop_na(GS) %>%
  #filter(Phase == "Exponential") %>% 
  select(c(GS, PARPhotonDose_day, Strain, Phase, O2, WL)) 

# Fit the data
fitted <- GScatalogMetaExpSt %>% 
  nest(-c(Strain, Phase, O2, WL)) %>%
  mutate(
    fit = map(data, ~nls(GS ~ SSasymp(PARPhotonDose_day, yf, y0, log_alpha), data = .)),
    tidied = map(fit, tidy),
    augmented = map(fit, augment)) 

# Produce a table of fit parameters: y0, yf, alpha
fitted_GS_Param<-fitted %>% 
  unnest(tidied) %>% 
  select(Strain, Phase, term, estimate) %>% 
pivot_wider(., names_from = c(term), values_from = c(estimate)) %>% 
  mutate(alpha = exp(log_alpha)) 

augmented<-fitted  %>%
  unnest(augmented) %>%
  select(c(Strain, Phase, O2, WL, PARPhotonDose_day,GS, .fitted)) 

```

# Calculated Anova and Tukey test from data points

```{r calculated statistics}
GScatalogMetaFitStats<-GScatalogMetaFit 
  #filter(Par_ue != 600) 

GScatalogMetaFitStats$Par_ue <- factor(GScatalogMetaFitStats$Par_ue)
GScatalogMetaFitStats$Photoperiod <- factor(GScatalogMetaFitStats$Photoperiod)
GScatalogMetaFitStats$Strain <- factor(GScatalogMetaFitStats$Strain)
GScatalogMetaFitStats$Phase <- factor(GScatalogMetaFitStats$Phase)
GScatalogMetaFitStats$PARPhotonDose_day <- factor(GScatalogMetaFitStats$PARPhotonDose_day)

# Three way Anova with interactions
model<-aov(GS~PARPhotonDose_day*Phase*Strain, data=GScatalogMetaFitStats)
Anova_GS<-data.frame(unclass(summary(model)), check.names = FALSE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
#TukeyHSDTest_GS<-TukeyHSD(model, which = c("PARPhotonDose_day", "Phase", "Strain"))
```

# Save Rds that create stats and tables

```{r}
saveRDS(Anova_GS, file.path(TableRdsPath, paste(Project, "Anova_GS.Rds", sep = "_"), fsep = .Platform$file.sep), ascii = FALSE, version = NULL, compress = "xz", refhook = NULL)
```

# Calculated Anova and Tukey test from exponential decay parameters

```{r calculated statistics}

fitted_GS_Param[2, 4] = NA
fitted_GS_Param[2, 6] = NA

GS_Param<-fitted_GS_Param 
  
GSStats<-GS_Param 
GSStats2<-rbind(GSStats, GSStats)
GSStats2$Strain <- factor(GSStats2$Strain)
GSStats2$Phase <- factor(GSStats2$Phase)

# Two-way Anova
model<-aov(y0~Strain*Phase, data=GSStats2)
AnovaTest_GS_y0<-data.frame(unclass(summary(model)), check.names = FALSE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
AnovaTest_GS_y0$Parameter <- 'y0'

model<-aov(yf~Strain*Phase, data=GSStats2)
AnovaTest_GS_yf<-data.frame(unclass(summary(model)), check.names = FALSE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
AnovaTest_GS_yf$Parameter <- 'yf'

model<-aov(alpha~Strain*Phase, data=GSStats2)
AnovaTest_GS_alpha<-data.frame(unclass(summary(model)), check.names = FALSE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
AnovaTest_GS_alpha$Parameter <- 'alpha'

Anova_GS_Param<-rbind(AnovaTest_GS_y0, AnovaTest_GS_yf, AnovaTest_GS_alpha)

rm(AnovaTest_GS_y0, AnovaTest_GS_yf, AnovaTest_GS_alpha, GSStats, GSStats2, model, fitted_GS_Param)
```

# Anova from the model - compare fits

```{r}
#1->048 St
#2->056 St
#3->077 St
#4->127 St
#5->127 Exp
#6->048 Exp
#7->056 Exp
#8->077 Exp

#Comparing model for strains from Exp phase
fittedmodelStrainExp<-fittedmodel 
  anova056077Exp<-anova(fittedmodelStrainExp[[3]][[7]], fittedmodelStrainExp[[3]][[8]])
  anova056077Exp$FitComparison <- '056_077_Exp'
  anova048127Exp<-anova(fittedmodelStrainExp[[3]][[6]], fittedmodelStrainExp[[3]][[5]])
  anova048127Exp$FitComparison <- '048_127_Exp'
  anova056048Exp<-anova(fittedmodelStrainExp[[3]][[7]], fittedmodelStrainExp[[3]][[6]])
  anova056048Exp$FitComparison <- '056_048_Exp'
  anova077048Exp<-anova(fittedmodelStrainExp[[3]][[8]], fittedmodelStrainExp[[3]][[6]])
  anova077048Exp$FitComparison <- '077_048_Exp'
  anova056127Exp<-anova(fittedmodelStrainExp[[3]][[7]], fittedmodelStrainExp[[3]][[5]])
  anova056127Exp$FitComparison <- '056_127_Exp'
  anova077127Exp<-anova(fittedmodelStrainExp[[3]][[8]], fittedmodelStrainExp[[3]][[5]])
  anova077127Exp$FitComparison <- '077_127_Exp'
  anovaStrainExp<-rbind(anova056077Exp, anova048127Exp, anova056048Exp, anova077048Exp, anova056127Exp, anova077127Exp)
  anovaStrainExp <-anovaStrainExp %>% 
  drop_na(Df) 
  rm(anova056077Exp, anova048127Exp, anova056048Exp, anova077048Exp, anova056127Exp, anova077127Exp)

#Comparing model for strains from St phase
fittedmodelStrainSt<-fittedmodel 
  anova056077St<-anova(fittedmodelStrainSt[[3]][[2]], fittedmodelStrainSt[[3]][[3]])
  anova056077St$FitComparison <- '056_077_St'
  anova048127St<-anova(fittedmodelStrainSt[[3]][[1]], fittedmodelStrainSt[[3]][[4]])
  anova048127St$FitComparison <- '048_127_St'
  anova056048St<-anova(fittedmodelStrainSt[[3]][[1]], fittedmodelStrainSt[[3]][[2]])
  anova056048St$FitComparison <- '056_048_St'
  anova077048St<-anova(fittedmodelStrainSt[[3]][[3]], fittedmodelStrainSt[[3]][[1]])
  anova077048St$FitComparison <- '077_048_St'
  anova056127St<-anova(fittedmodelStrainSt[[3]][[2]], fittedmodelStrainSt[[3]][[4]])
  anova056127St$FitComparison <- '056_127_St'
  anova077127St<-anova(fittedmodelStrainSt[[3]][[3]], fittedmodelStrainSt[[3]][[4]])
  anova077127St$FitComparison <- '077_127_St'
  anovaStrainSt<-rbind(anova056077St, anova048127St, anova056048St, anova077048St, anova056127St, anova077127St)
  anovaStrainSt <-anovaStrainSt %>% 
  drop_na(Df) 
  rm(anova056077St, anova048127St, anova056048St, anova077048St, anova056127St, anova077127St)
  
#Comparing model for each strains from different phase (Exp vs St)
fittedmodelPhase<-fittedmodel 
  anova056ExpSt<-anova(fittedmodelPhase[[3]][[7]], fittedmodelPhase[[3]][[2]])
  anova056ExpSt$FitComparison <- '056_Exp_St'
  anova077ExpSt<-anova(fittedmodelPhase[[3]][[8]], fittedmodelPhase[[3]][[3]])
  anova077ExpSt$FitComparison <- '077_Exp_St'
  anova048ExpSt<-anova(fittedmodelPhase[[3]][[6]], fittedmodelPhase[[3]][[1]])
  anova048ExpSt$FitComparison <- '048_Exp_St'
  anova127ExpSt<-anova(fittedmodelPhase[[3]][[5]], fittedmodelPhase[[3]][[4]])
  anova127ExpSt$FitComparison <- '127_Exp_St'
  anovaPhase<-rbind(anova056ExpSt, anova077ExpSt, anova048ExpSt, anova127ExpSt)
  anovaPhase <-anovaPhase %>% 
  drop_na(Df) 
  rm(anova056ExpSt, anova077ExpSt, anova048ExpSt, anova127ExpSt)

  Anova_GS_Model<-rbind(anovaStrainExp, anovaStrainSt, anovaPhase)
  
  rm(anovaStrainExp, anovaStrainSt, anovaPhase)
```

# Performed a t-test using the coefficients from a non-linear model in R.
Welch Two Sample t-test - Welch's t-test

In statistics, Welch's t-test, or unequal variances t-test, is a two-sample location test which is used to test the (null) hypothesis that two populations have equal means. It is more reliable when the two samples have unequal variances and possibly unequal sample sizes. These tests are often referred to as "unpaired" or "independent samples" t-tests, as they are typically applied when the statistical units underlying the two samples being compared are non-overlapping. Given that Welch's t-test has been less popular than Student's t-test and may be less familiar to readers, a more informative name is "Welch's unequal variances t-test" â or "unequal variances t-test" for brevity.
